attributes.action: Keep students off for the rest of the school year.
attributes.additional_details: Due to the on going corona virus students off school. However if schools open back up there will still be a chance of it spreading again. Although the students may not be offended a lot of people live elder people who are more vulnerable to the virus.
attributes.background: I think the government should keep school off until the end of the summer and make sure this virus has less of a chance of returning
